name: cats with questions
description:
how long can you live like it's the end of the world when the world keeps not actually ending

how to play: use wasd or arrow keys (or on mobile, swipe) to move and interact

notes on development:

  • made in bitsy for me, a version of bitsy (by Adam Le Doux) that i hacked together to better suit my needs
  • tools i used:
    • fontsy and transparent-sprites hack by Sean
    • bitsy room converter by hideous-cave-goblin
  • inspired by Michael Bonardi's Eidullion
  • recommended listening: [link here]
